content: Is there an upcoming telecon where the workgroups would want to hear updates on SMARTv2? I'd be happy to share details on the updates we've put in place for the upcoming ballot. (Would this be a "main" call, or a "fhir" call?)
the main call is coming up, but I can't make that. You are welcome on monday.
Perfect, I'll plan to join Monday at noon ET
I have you on the top of the agenda today.
